desc: For amazing Cajun food, colorful beads, incredible jazz music, and a wild parade and party.
name: Mardi Gras Festival

desc: Festival of lights that signifies the victory of light over darkness.
name: Diwali

desc: The most grueling bicycle races on the planet, this is not an event you want to miss.
name: Le Tour de France

desc: Japanese ceremony in which participants float paper lanterns (chōchin) down a river.
name: Tōrō Nagashi

desc: Gatherings of family and friends to pray for and remember people who have died.
name: Day of the Dead

desc: Plenty of good fortune with feasts, parades, lanterns, colorful costumes, and lots of rituals.
name: Chinese New Year

desc: The world’s most prestigious and highly anticipated international soccer/football competition.
name: FIFA World Cup 2020

desc: See the incredible works of art made from snow and ice at one of the most unique festivals in the world.
name: Sapporo Snow Festival

desc: The festival presents a wide variety of musical and theatrical events in several venues.
name: Bregenz Festival
